title: Can you print on index cards? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can. Assuming it's printing on a desktop printer, the printer needs to be a front-loading or top-loading plus the print path is roughly in a single plane (rather than turning a different direction somewhere inside the machine).   (via bidorbuy.co.za)  For example, the older Hewlett-Packard LaserJet 5L and 6L were very good for printing on index cards.
